comments:
Error occurs whenever trying syntax checking for the following example.pf on basis of the pfdsl.xtxt:

http://mcs.open.ac.uk/yy66/xtext/pfdsl.xtxt
http://mcs.open.ac.uk/yy66/xtext/example.pf

I am not sure the source of the problem. Is it a bug in the generated ANTLR grammar or a mistake in the XTXT grammar?

=================================
org.openarchitectureware.expression.EvaluationException: Couldn't find type NamedVariables in nofile on line 1 'org.openarchitectureware.expression.ast.ConstructorCallExpression@4be179'
	at org.openarchitectureware.expression.ast.ConstructorCallExpression.evaluateInternal(ConstructorCallExpression.java:35)
	at org.openarchitectureware.expression.ast.Expression.evaluate(Expression.java:42)
	at org.openarchitectureware.expression.ExpressionFacade.evaluate(ExpressionFacade.java:62)
	at org.openarchitectureware.expression.ExpressionFacade.evaluate(ExpressionFacade.java:51)
	at org.openarchitectureware.xtext.parser.EcoreModelFactory.create(EcoreModelFactory.java:63)
	at uk.ac.open.pf.parser.pfdslParser.ruleNamedVariables(pfdslParser.java:243)
	at uk.ac.open.pf.parser.pfdslParser.ruleProblemDiagram(pfdslParser.java:76)
	at uk.ac.open.pf.pfdslUtilities.internalParse(pfdslUtilities.java:31)
The problem has been found in both 4.1 and 4.1.1 versions.
It's your xtxt grammar which is ambiguous.
